text: Kajiji Airport is an airport serving Kajiji in Bandundu Province, Democratic Republic of the Congo. The airport and village are on a mesa with dropoffs to the west and south. ==See also== * * * Transport in the Democratic Republic of the Congo * List of airports in the Democratic Republic of the Congo ==References== ==External links== * FallingRain - Kajiji Airport * HERE Maps - Kajiji * OpenStreetMaps - Kajiji * OurAirports - Kajiji Airport * Category:Airports in Kwango Province
title: Kajiji Airport
